titleStmt.title: Kālādarśa of Kavi Vallabha and Vyavahāranirṇaya of Varadarāja

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains two texts. There are two notes before the front gourd cover. One mentions Varadarājīya Dharma varadarāja Granth 300p 9 lines old and incomplete. The other note is by V Raghavan. It says ``There are …. Two works in this codex. 1 kavivallabha’s Kālādarśa (not noted on the codex) 2 Varadarāja’s Vyavahāranirṇaya See slips inside inserted by me. V Raghavan 19.12.53." Some folio are half blank for example folio number 40v, 41r is left blank. Manuscript is very old and thus folio are affected, ink is very faint and so the handwriting is very blurred. Foliation is not continues. It is difficult to say how many folio are missing as the margins are broken which has resulted in loss of foliation.

msItem.title: Kālādarśa
msItem.author: kavivallabha
msItem.incipit: text1-1v 1 [na tvam?] (gap of a syllable due to old, broken folio) jñānavarya ādipuruṣa uvāca la[ghu?]ni vanacaro giri tadeṣu caranti taṃ veṇunā sa yati gāndhayadāsmi vanalatā sa taravaḥ
msItem.explicit: text1-141r 4 na tu madhyamaḥ . prabhāte gamyasya pātane daṇḍyuttanaṃ halAdi? gaṃdhate bo text1-141r 5 dhāyanaḥ . haṃsābarhiṇaścakacau kābālākkāko? text1-167v 4 ta iti yajñakālanirṇayaprakaraṇaṃ .. smṛ?tyākāma? ityādityabhaṭṭācāryavaryakavivallabhāvaranāmnogranthakulatilakasya kṛtau kālādaraś text1-167v 5 au kālanirṇayasamāptaṃ . (2 syllables are broken due to folio damage.) kovidyaḥ kṛtadhīyaṃ kavivallabhasya vijñāpanā grantha? viracitaḥ pramāṇe kālasya nirṇayana (2 illegible syllables) niyamtya
msItem.finalRubric: text1-167v 8 ṣāmaprekṣyā ime granthā iti dakramamayoktaram . harakaraśaśiyutaśāke caitre śuddhamahiṃsmṛtasyānti .. karakṛtamaparā text1-167v 9 dhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. hariḥ oṃ ..

msItem.title: Vyavahāranirṇaya
msItem.author: Varadarāja
msItem.incipit: text2-200v 1 asmānuṇye? jajñasuyāt purāṇe nisargaparṇova?śvapakṣaba? (Rest of the line is unreadable)
msItem.explicit: text2-2223r 12 tvijajanaḥ ppaścāt sandigdhavṛtati sta?? vijñānaśaṃsanādvidāla? ? nācca ?? hidi ? ? prāgurvibhāgeva (rest is not readable.)

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: Mostly unreadable due to old folio and faint ink. Also many times conjunct letters are mixed and confusing.

listBibl.bibl: Vyavahāranirṇaya of Varadarājam Adyar library series 29 editors K V Rangaswami Aiyangar and A N Krishna Aiyangar Madras 1942

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Question marks are used to show unreadable syllables .
